snippet: "If you want to be president, man up and be president," Rick Santorum said.
abstract: "If you want to be president, man up and be president," Rick Santorum said.
lead_paragraph: URBANDALE, Iowa - The students at Des Moines Christian Assembly found out Tuesday morning that class was being dismissed early so they could get a special civics lesson from a visiting former United States senator, Rick Santorum.

headline.main: Santorum Delivers Harsh Critique of Obama and His Values
